readme.txt.content: Play this game by pasting the script in http://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html

script.txt.content:
title Coping Mechanisms
author Jack Lance
run_rules_on_level_start

mouse_left
mouse_drag
mouse_right
mouse_rdrag

verbose_logging

=======
LEGEND
=======

. = Background
player = select or make or move or during or hinge or destroy
P = move


0 = blob
1 = blob and cd
2 = blob and hd
3 = blob and cr
4 = blob and cd and cr
5 = blob and hd and cr
6 = blob and hr
7 = blob and cd and hr
8 = blob and hd and hr

xu = cu or hu
xd = cd or hd
xl = cl or hl
xr = cr or hr



cx = cu or cl or cd or cr
hx = hu or hl or hd or hr
mx = mu or ml or md or mr
ax = au or al or ad or ar

z = zone
q = make

- = bad

trying = tryinga or tryingb

rdrag = rmb

=======
SOUNDS
=======

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

Background
zone
blob
cd, 
cl, 
cr,
cu, 
scd,
scl,
scr,
scu,
shd
shl
shr
shu
sblob
saving
active
al
ar
ad
au
hd, md
hl, ml
hr, mr
hu, mu
select, block
make, move, during, hinge, destroy
goal
unsupported
cant
bad
tryinga
tryingb

lmb
drag
rmb
======
RULES
======

([ lmb during ] -> [ during ])
[ lmb block ] -> [ block ]
[ lmb no player ][ player ] -> [ lmb player ][ ]

[ lmb select ] -> [ lmb move ]
[ lmb during ] -> [ lmb make ]
[ lmb hinge ] -> [ lmb make ]
[ lmb destroy ] -> [ lmb make ]
[ lmb player ] -> [ action player ]

[ rmb no player ][ player no move no select ] -> [ destroy ][ ]
[ rmb player no move no select ] -> [ destroy ]
[ rmb ] -> [ ]

[ player | drag ] -> [ > player | ]
[ drag ] -> [ ]


[action make no zone][blob] -> [move saving][blob]

[saving][blob no sblob] -> [saving][blob sblob]
[saving][hu no shu] -> [saving][hu shu]
[saving][hd no shd] -> [saving][hd shd]
[saving][hl no shl] -> [saving][hl shl]
[saving][hr no shr] -> [saving][hr shr]
[saving][cu no scu] -> [saving][cu scu]
[saving][cd no scd] -> [saving][cd scd]
[saving][cl no scl] -> [saving][cl scl]
[saving][cr no scr] -> [saving][cr scr]

[saving] -> []

[action move zone no blob][blob] -> [action move zone][]
[action move zone no blob][hx] -> [action move zone][]
[action move zone no blob][cx] -> [action move zone][]

[action move zone no blob][shu] -> [action move zone][hu]
[action move zone no blob][shl] -> [action move zone][hl]
[action move zone no blob][shd] -> [action move zone][hd]
[action move zone no blob][shr] -> [action move zone][hr]
[action move zone no blob][scu] -> [action move zone][cu]
[action move zone no blob][scl] -> [action move zone][cl]
[action move zone no blob][scd] -> [action move zone][cd]
[action move zone no blob][scr] -> [action move zone][cr]
[action move zone no blob][sblob no move] -> [action move zone][blob]
[action move zone no blob][sblob] -> [ make zone][blob]

[action move zone no blob] -> [make zone]

[action make zone no blob] -> [during blob zone]

[action make zone blob] -> [hinge zone blob]


[> hinge | no zone ] -> [ | make]
[> during | no zone ] -> [ | make] 

up [up hinge cu| ] -> [ cu |hinge ]
down [down hinge cd| ] -> [ cd |hinge ]
left [left hinge cl| ] -> [ cl |hinge ]
right [right hinge cr| ] -> [ cr |hinge ]

up [up hinge | blob] -> [ > tryinga |make < tryingb blob]
down [down hinge | blob] -> [ > tryinga |make < tryingb blob]
left [left hinge | blob] -> [ > tryinga |make < tryingb blob]
right [right hinge | blob] -> [ > tryinga |make < tryingb blob]

up [up hinge | no blob] -> [ hu |during hd blob]
down [down hinge | no blob] -> [ hd |during hu blob]
left [left hinge | no blob] -> [ hl |during hr blob]
right [right hinge | no blob] -> [ hr |during hl blob]

[action hinge] -> [destroy]
[action destroy] -> [make]



up [up during blob no cu| blob] -> [ blob > tryinga| < tryingb make blob]
down [down during blob no cd| blob] -> [ blob > tryinga| < tryingb make blob]
left [left during blob no cl| blob] -> [ blob > tryinga| < tryingb make blob]
right [right during blob no cr| blob] -> [ blob > tryinga| < tryingb make blob]

up [up during | no blob no block zone] -> [cu | cd blob during zone]
down [down during | no blob no block zone] -> [cd | cu blob during zone]
left [left during | no blob no block zone] -> [cl | cr blob during zone]
right [right during | no blob no block zone] -> [cr | cl blob  during zone]


[tryinga][xu] -> [tryinga][up xu]
[tryinga][xl] -> [tryinga][left xl]
[tryinga][xr] -> [tryinga][right xr]
[tryinga][xd] -> [tryinga][down xd]

startloop

[ blob > hx | blob trying] -> [ blob > hx trying| blob trying]
[ blob > cx | blob trying] -> [ blob > cx trying| blob trying]

endloop

[cx] -> [stationary cx]
[hx] -> [stationary hx]

[moving tryinga][tryinga tryingb][moving tryingb] -> [stationary tryinga][tryinga tryingb][stationary tryingb]

[up trying] -> [hu]
[down trying] -> [hd]
[left trying] -> [hl]
[right trying] -> [hr]

[trying] -> []

late [destroy blob] -> [destroy]
late [destroy hx] -> [destroy]
late [destroy cx] -> [destroy]
late right [xr | destroy] -> [ | destroy]
late left [xl | destroy] -> [ | destroy]
late down [xd | destroy] -> [ | destroy]
late up [xu | destroy] -> [ | destroy]
late [during no zone] -> [make]

[action during] -> [make]

[action select blob] -> [move blob]
[action move blob] -> [select blob]


[select blob unsupported] -> [down select blob unsupported]

[select][blob unsupported] -> [select ][down blob]

[move][blob unsupported] -> [move ][down blob]


up [hu | ] -> [hu | hd]
down [hd | ] -> [hd | hu]
left [hl | ] -> [hl | hr]
right [hr | ] -> [hr | hl]
up [cu | ] -> [cu | cd]
down [cd | ] -> [cd | cu]
left [cl | ] -> [cl | cr]
right [cr | ] -> [cr | cl]

[xu] -> [up xu]
[xl] -> [left xl]
[xr] -> [right xr]
[xd] -> [down xd]

[cant] -> []

up [up select][blob | block] -> [up select][blob cant | block]
left [left select][blob | block] -> [left select][blob cant | block]
down [down select][blob | block] -> [down select][blob cant | block]
right [right select][blob | block] -> [right select][blob cant | block]

startloop

[ blob > cx | blob cant] -> [ blob > cx cant| blob cant]
up [up select][blob | cant] -> [up select][blob cant | cant]
left [left select][blob | cant] -> [left select][blob cant | cant]
down [down select][blob | cant] -> [down select][blob cant | cant]
right [right select][blob | cant] -> [right select][blob cant | cant]

endloop

[> select blob no cant] -> [> select > blob]

[select cant] -> [stationary select cant]



startloop

[moving blob > cx | blob] -> [moving blob > cx| moving blob]

[> blob > hu | blob] -> [> blob > mu | > blob]
+[> blob > hl | blob] -> [> blob > ml | > blob]
+[> blob > hd | blob] -> [> blob > md | > blob]
+[> blob > hr | blob] -> [> blob > mr | > blob]
[> blob  | blob] -> [> blob | > blob]
[< blob > hu | blob] -> [< blob > mu | < blob]
[< blob > hl | blob] -> [< blob > ml | < blob]
[< blob > hd | blob] -> [< blob > md | < blob]
[< blob > hr | blob] -> [< blob > mr | < blob]


[no cl right blob up hu] -> [right blob up mu]
[no cl right blob down hd] -> [right blob down md]
[no cr left blob up hu] -> [left blob up mu]
[no cr left blob down hd] -> [left blob down md]
[no cd up blob left hl] -> [up blob left ml]
[no cd up blob right hr] -> [up blob right mr]
[no cu down blob left hl] -> [down blob left ml]
[no cu down blob right hr] -> [down blob right mr]

[> mx | < hl] -> [> mx | < ml]
[> mx | < hd] -> [> mx | < md]
[> mx | < hr] -> [> mx | < mr]
[> mx | < hu] -> [> mx | < mu]

[right select][stationary blob mx no cr] -> [right select][right blob mx]
[left select][stationary blob mx no cl] -> [left select][left blob mx]
[down select][stationary blob mx no cd] -> [down select][down blob mx]
[up select][stationary blob mx no cu] -> [up select][up blob mx]
endloop

[> blob | block] -> cancel

[hx] -> [stationary hx]

[moving select][md] -> [moving select][moving hd]
[moving select][mu] -> [moving select][moving hu]
[moving select][ml] -> [moving select][moving hl]
[moving select][mr] -> [moving select][moving hr]

[stationary select][md] -> [stationary select][down hd]
[stationary select][mu] -> [stationary select][down hu]
[stationary select][ml] -> [stationary select][down hl]
[stationary select][mr] -> [stationary select][down hr]

[stationary move][md] -> [stationary move][down hd]
[stationary move][mu] -> [stationary move][down hu]
[stationary move][ml] -> [stationary move][down hl]
[stationary move][mr] -> [stationary move][down hr]

[cx] -> [stationary cx]


[moving blob cx] -> [moving blob moving cx]

late [blob] -> [blob unsupported]
late down [blob unsupported|block] -> [blob | block]

startloop
late up [blob xu unsupported | no unsupported] -> [blob xu | ]
late down [blob xd unsupported | no unsupported] -> [blob xd | ]
late left [blob xl unsupported | no unsupported] -> [blob xl | ]
late right [blob xr unsupported | no unsupported] -> [blob xr | ]


late down [blob unsupported|blob no unsupported] -> [blob | blob]
endloop

late [blob unsupported] -> again

late [ax] -> []
late [active] -> []

late [select blob] -> [select blob active]
startloop
late [active cl] -> [active cl al]
late [active cr] -> [active cr ar]
late [active cd] -> [active cd ad]
late [active cu] -> [active cu au]
late up [au | blob] -> [au | blob active]
late down [ad | blob] -> [ad | blob active]
late left [al | blob] -> [al | blob active]
late right [ar | blob] -> [ar | blob active]
endloop

late [blob bad][blob no bad][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]
late [blob bad][hx][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]
late [blob bad][cx][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]
late [blob bad][ax][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]
late [blob bad][select][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]
late [blob bad][active][zone] -> [blob bad][][zone]

late [blob bad][shu] -> [blob bad][hu]
late [blob bad][shl] -> [blob bad][hl]
late [blob bad][shd] -> [blob bad][hd]
late [blob bad][shr] -> [blob bad][hr]
late [blob bad][scu] -> [blob bad][cu]
late [blob bad][scl] -> [blob bad][cl]
late [blob bad][scd] -> [blob bad][cd]
late [blob bad][scr] -> [blob bad][cr]
late [blob bad][sblob] -> [blob bad][blob]

 late [blob bad][zone] -> [bad][zone make]
 (late [blob bad][zone] -> [bad][zone])



[blob bad] -> restart

late [make][move] -> [make][]

late [unsupported no blob] -> []

==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============
all goal on blob
no unsupported

=======
LEVELS
======= 

message WARMUP 1/3

message Press action to select the robot, then move it to the exit without hitting any spikes

xxxxxxxxx
x.......x
x1..p...x
x0......x

x.......x
xx.xxx.xx

xxxxxxxxx

message WARMUP 3/3

message In levels with multiple bots, you only need to get one to the exit

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
x.............x
x...p.........x
x...........g.x
x.............x
x.11...x......x
x.2630.x......x
x.30..1x......x
xxx.360x....xxx
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

message LEVEL 1/8

message Draw your robot's design in the blue zone

message Press action and move around to start drawing a component, and action again to finish

message Press action on a component and move to draw a hinge

message Lastly, press action OUTSIDE THE BLUE ZONE TO PLAY with your designed robot

message You can also press action in hinge mode to go to erase mode...

message Basically, whatever you want to do, press action a bunch and you'll probably get to it. (It'll be easier once you get used to it.)

xzzzz.....x

xzzzz.....x
xxxxxxxxxxx

message If you are in play mode, you can return to make mode by pressing action IN THE BLUE ZONE
